name: pflynn.nativecode
title: C++/Objective-C Pack
author: Peter Flynn
description: Enhancements for Brackets when working with C, C++, Objective-C or Objective-C++ -- Objective-C/C++ syntax highlighting, Ctrl-T (Quick Find Definition) for navigating a file, Ctrl-J (Jump to Definition) on #include jumps to included file, Ctrl-Shift-J anywhere toggles between header and main src file.
